previewText: The City of Splendors is a center of commerce, where representatives of every race, creed, and nation come to trade, spread rumors, and make their fortunes.
benefit: You know one additional language of your choice, you add Diplomacy to your class skill list, and you gain a +2 bonus to Diplomacy checks.
flavor: The Jewel of the North is a crossroads city hungry for coin and tolerant of outsiders.
